Reviews.Title: Nice Little Phone
Reviews.Author: Manette Gerstle "MANETTE"
Reviews.Content: This Gravity One phone has all the features my daughter wanted.  She is delighted with its texting ability as well as its utility as a cell phone and camera.

Reviews.Title: Very STRONG PHONE! BUILT TO LAST
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is GREAT! if you're someone who is clumsy and LOVES to drop things on accident, then this is THE phone for you. serious! i can NOT tell you HOW MUCH i've dropped this phone, because there's no count for it. i'm pretty sure 1000 times, literally. if you saw my phone you would understand. And my dog, OMG, my dogg. one time i left the battery holder thing on the couch cause i was gonna wipe my battery cuz it was wet, then i came back and my dog was EATING it. there's a chunk gone from it. I've dropped this phone in water 3 times. and it's still alive. Very high quality. It takesa while for all the keys to work, but rice isn't necessary. jst wipe the battery, hair dry it, and if it still doesn't work, put it in the oven for 20 minutes 100 degrees Fahrenheit. Anyway, it's good for texting. Features are ohkay, but it doesn't really matterr. this is definitely a good phone, for first timers because they like to drop their phones xD

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG T456 GRAVITY UNLOCKED GSM PHONE
Reviews.Author: luvsteddybears
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG T456 GRAVITY UNLOCKED GSM PHONEI bought this as a replacement phone.. I had a gravity phone for a couple years and I accidently spilled something on it. So I ordered this phone because I knew that the phone itself was a great phone. The phone came rathr quickly. I had only one problem with it. I ordered the white gravity and ended up with a gray one. It even said gray on the box. I could have returned it but I decided not to because I needed a phone..But other than that everything was great.

Reviews.Title: One INVINCIBLE Phone!
Reviews.Author: My Pen  Name
Reviews.Content: This phone is WONDERFUL! It is very easy to use and I am very pleased with how it was. I happen to be very clumsy and I have dropped it like a million times and it never broke or slowed down or anything. That is why I would call it an invincible phone. The only problem that I had with this phone was that when I was texting, when I pressed a letter it would sometimes skip it or it would double or triple the letters, so for example, if I were to type "bubble gum," it would go "bbuuble gggum" or "uuble gm." I don't see this as a big problem, and it only started to happen about a year and a half after I purchased the phone. All in all, I give this phone a 4.7 out of five, 0.3 off because of the keyboard. This is a great phone for a younger phone user, a person who loves to text, a clumsy person, or a first time phone user.

Reviews.Title: Ripoff
Reviews.Author: S. Mijares
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new phone for $80.00 and received a used phone with photos already on it and a chip on the back. I sent an email & received "I suggest you file a claim". By the 4th email, I got instructions on how to return on it, at my expense. Too much hassle, too slow, lousy customer service. I'll never buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Jan Stone
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.. its my 3rd one .. LOL .. its perfect for those who only want to talk and tex .. the phone came packaged well and before arrival date ..

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: HighSchoolGirl
Reviews.Content: The QWERTY keyboard is a feature that I enjoy immensely and am glad that this keyboard is easy to use, also the description didn't let you know that a charger was included so I actually bought another charger, but to my surprise, when I opened my package there was a charger neatly tucked beside the phone. I'm ok with having two chargers, one for work, and one for home. Also, I ordered this phone on the 14th and it arrived on the 19th, 4 days before I was expecting it, which was good for me, because I dropped my previous phone in the toilet :( but I like this phone a lot, and will update this review if anything new comes to light. Happy Shopping.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Kelsey McNeely
Reviews.Content: I got years of heavy use out of my first Samsung Gravity T459. I dropped my phone multiple times a day, it went through the washer twice and my dog tried eating it- it is nearly indestructible. When my phone finally died I was determined to buy another. The phone was delivered on the expected arrival date and it was in great condition. No scratches on the front and there was still a screen protector on the phone. There were a few small, barely noticeable scratches on the back but that's to be expected when buying used phones. The only thing that bothered me was it was not EXACTLY the same as the phone I was replacing and it won't let me set it on vibrate. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Gravity
Reviews.Author: J. Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Works  OK. The disappointment with this phone is that it appears identical to my first T-Mobile phone. which I loved; but, it is not identical. So I have to make changes and adpt again. Bummer.

Reviews.Title: Broken!!
Reviews.Author: Unhappy pixie
Reviews.Content: I had so much trouble with this phone!! I tried to charge it when I got it and it wouldn't work! So I tried to send it back, the person I contacted was rude and was going to make me pay to ship it back!! So I said forget it and was planning on cutting my losses my mom tinkered with and finally got it to turn on, but it turns it's self off all the time. So I will never buy a phone or any electronic from here again!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone...
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Stephenson
Reviews.Content: It hasn't broken yet!! The keyboard is great for small hands and I've dropped it dozens of times without a cover, and it still works. Now, it's been down one toilet and into one pail of dirty water. It takes a licking and keeps on ticking! Cons: it sometimes turns itself off, it sometimes doesn't save numbers. Love my text screen, although not a fashionable phone, does need more memory to store old texts. If that doesn't matter, then this the best texting phone around.

Reviews.Title: summary  on  T 456  samsung  phone  review
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: needs  less  smother  back  plate  to grip  nice  call features  receives  well  better than  newer  model  photos  texting  is  easy  on  keys  no  touch  screen  a plus  keeps  charge  4  days  longer  than  newer  phones  nice  phone  for  the  money  photos  not  that  great  on  not  clear  but  its  only  1.3  pix

Reviews.Title: love i
Reviews.Author: theresa raschke
Reviews.Content: I have used this phone for years - it was a replacement and I am happy with it and will always love it

Reviews.Title: Seriously, Nice Durable Phone
Reviews.Author: Just213
Reviews.Content: This phone can handle drops & kids.  The features are OKAY, but nothing outstanding.  I really loved that lil phone.  I got mad & REALLY smashed it so now I have to get a new one.  But this one works as expected

Reviews.Title: Samsung Gravity
Reviews.Author: Rich T
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Excellent sliding qwerty keyboard, perfect for texting2. Good basic features3. Good looking4. Inexpensive5. Prepaid locked (T-mobile) version can be unlocked (by T-mobile) and will then work on any GSM network worldwide.Cons:1. Now an old model2. No firmware updates available3. No synching features with Mac4. Occasional software glitch where incoming call is mis-labled as a different address book item (usually the last text message)5. Pressing alt-key to get symbols in texts doesn't revert to regular text unless you click it again. If you forget you get a string of symbols. If you hold down the delete key to try to back up to where the symbols begin, the entire text message is lost.Bottom line: Good basic phone especially for texters. Minor glitches.Other comments: Using this phone now for over a year and have been happy with it. Bought it at a brick and mortar store as a prepaid Tmobile phone, but also works fine with Tmobile postpaid accounts. I have had no problem with battery life or with phone turning off.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!!
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I used it for about 8 months before I upgraded to the MyTouch. Only issue I had while using it was about 3 months in use the battery started to not hold a charge and would turn the phone off all the time. I called T-Mobile and they sent me a new battery and my phone worked like normal after that!

Reviews.Title: Overall phone works great!
Reviews.Author: S. Lauriano "scarymc"
Reviews.Content: I had the samsung gravity 3 at first but lucky me i broke it and amazon didn't have any in stock, so i went with the first one! It works great no problems thus far. The only thing is it came with a rather weird charger. I have to plug in a peice thats a adapter for it to go in the wall and its so bulky it doesnt stay in. Its a bit of a problem for me. Plus i don't wanna loose part of my charger! As far as service it was hell to get the product to me because something I did not do. But something happened with shipping where my address was not written down correctly. The funny thing is I was ordering a phone because I didnt have one. I put a friends number down for this phone I had ordered but my number down for a previous order. Yet they left me voicemails on my phone about the samsung? As for as communication they didn't do too good, i was just being thrown around in circles by UPS and the Seller. BUT phone works great, awesome price too :)

Reviews.Title: Lame
Reviews.Author: M. Gottschalk
Reviews.Content: It turns itself off if you look at it the wrong way, and mine has the major defect of not going into the phone book when you tell it to do so. I know I'm hitting the right buttons, because other people with this phone are able to access their phone books. Also, when I hang up, I have to press the "end" button like three times before the thing will recognize my command.But you know, the design is just fine. It's an attractive little bugger, and easy to use. But I think that Samsung was rude to the pooch in terms of the actual quality of this phone.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: carrie_a
Reviews.Content: Nice phone but owner did not send a charger that worked, did not delete old contacts, did not delete old music.

Reviews.Title: Don't get fooled!
Reviews.Author: alexgol37
Reviews.Content: This phone lasted only 4 months before starting to malfunction.It should come as little surprise that gadgets fail, especially inexpensive ones. What makes thisparticular inexpensive product's failure so disconcerting is that the seller- the OEM shop - operatesunder the aegis of illustrious Amazon.com. True, they expressly claimed there was no warranty,and they are under no obligation to do anything, butI come from the school of thought that places high value on reputation and expect merchants tocare about their customers. Gullible me!

Reviews.Title: EXTREMELY DURABLE, Very Reliable and Fast
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Best Phone on the market.The keyboard is amazing, fast, and great to the touch.I've drop this like 10 times a day, and theyre hard drops, personally because I know that i have nothing to fear.This phone never breaks. Its amazing, I love it.I've had it for about 5 years now, works like a charm.After one full charge i dont charge it again until like another 3 days.Beautiful.

Reviews.Title: A Rogers phone????
Reviews.Author: La- la loop
Reviews.Content: The phone I received does not look like the one in the picture. The buttons are different. It is actually a " Roger's Phone," the phone says ROGERS when you turn it on. Many functions are different on this phone. Not exactly what I was looking for... The phone in the advertised picture is the one I was used to and was looking forward to getting. Bit of a turn off to get a different model. It seems to work well but has many different functions like " Roger's Mail" I have NO IDEA what that is. It is some sort of brand I am guessing. Anyway, I din't order a "Roger's" phone. I would like to say that it is exactly what I ordered- however, it is NOT what I ordered at all.( refer to picture of the phone i was buying. Beware.)

Reviews.Title: DISSAPOINTED
Reviews.Author: IEDDERF
Reviews.Content: I WAS EXPECTING THAT IT WAS UNLOCKED, APPARENTLY LOCKED WITH T - MOBILE. SO I DECIDED TO BRING IT IN ONE OF TRUSTED UNLOCKING SHOP HERE I HOUSTON.THE TECHNICIAN TOLD ME NO WAY TO UNLOCKED IT BECAUSE IT GOT A WATER DAMAGED.TO AVOID THE HASSLES OF RETURNING IT TO O. G. I WENT TO BESTBUY STORE AND HAD IT TRADED IN.

Reviews.Title: Phone not working
Reviews.Author: Falsechild
Reviews.Content: I went to the caribbean with the phone i try to use a local simcard and somehow all the software on the phone is gone

Reviews.Title: unlocked phone is still locked.
Reviews.Author: afo
Reviews.Content: I bought phone thinking it was unlocked but phone is locked. Person I bought it for just call from africa that she can't use the phone. It locked. Will have to pay to have it unlocked.

ProductInfo.Features:
Slide-out full QWERTY keyboard for easy typing; access to instant messaging and email services, text/picture/video messagingSlide-out full QWERTY keyboard for easy typing; access to instant messaging and email services, text/picture/video messaging
1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder, Bluetooth stereo music streaming, MicroSD expansion to 4 GB, organizer with calendar and notepad
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 288 hours (12 days) of standby timeUp to 6 hours of talk time, up to 288 hours (12 days) of standby time Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 288 hours (12 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Gravity T456/T459 Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 1.3 MP Camera, Bluetooth and Music Player - No Warranty - White
